page.title: 08SHOPPING IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: In the{New Town,}there are two main ways of shopping, at the Town Centre or at the local shops. The{Town Centre}is given over to shops,banks,offices and agencies that are to be found in most high streets _ a hypermarket, 2 department stores,an indoor market hall,solicitors and insurance offices as well as the normal range of shops for all types of goods. The Development Corporation offices are also here. Each area of the town has its own { {Local Shop}which stocks a wide range of goods.{Condorrat}has grown round the old village and most of the shops are in the main street and a good variety of products are to be found there. Many people still travel to { {Glasgow,Falkirk}or{Airdrie}where they have a wider range of shops.
